description: This file defines routing components for a React application, including protected routes that handle authentication verification, and main route configuration using React Router. It includes components such as ProtectedRoute, AdminRoute, AdminProtectedRoute, and AppRouter, managing user/admin authentication states and route guarding.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React component that guards routes requiring user authentication by verifying token presence and validity. Shows a loading state while checking and redirects to /login if invalid.

methods.name: AdminRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React component that provides a simple admin role check based on cached user data, redirecting non-admin users to the admin login page.

methods.name: AdminProtectedRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React component that guards admin-specific routes by verifying admin token and session validity, similar to ProtectedRoute but for admin users.

methods.name: AppRouter()
methods.description: The main routing component using React Router, defining public and protected routes for the app, including login, signup, main app, questions, and admin routes.
